sentences.sContent: It would be too simplistic to put all of this down to a cultural propensity to defer to bullying corporate bosses.
sentences.sContent_eng: It would be too simplistic to put all of this down to a cultural propensity to defer to bullying corporate bosses.
sentences.sCn: 如果把这一切归结为一种听命于仗势欺人的公司老板的文化习性，那么就会过于简单了。

remMethod.val: pro(提前) + pens(挂) + ity → 总是喜欢预先挂好 → 嗜好， 习性

trans.tranOther: a natural tendency to behave in a particular way
